jisa.devices

Class LS336

  • java.lang.Object
    • jisa.visa.VISADevice
      • jisa.devices.LS336
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instrument, MSMOTC, MSTC, MSTMeter, MultiOutput<MSTC>, MultiSensor<TMeter>, TC, TMeter

    public class LS336
extends VISADevice
implements MSMOTC
    Class for controlling Lake Shore Model 336 temperature controllers.

    They are generally annoying with a shoddy communications implementation. Hooray!

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface jisa.devices.MSMOTC

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface jisa.devices.TC
